siteTitle: Josh Grauer - UI/UX Designer and Full Stack Developer
name: Josh Grauer
footerDescription: © 2017. Site created with incredipixel portfolio, free and open source.

about.description:
Hi! I'm Josh and this is my portfolio.

I'm a lifelong learner and software development is my passion. My wheelhouse is UX design and front-end development, but I enjoy working within all levels of the stack.

By the way, if you'd like to put together a simple portfolio like this one, I've made the source code available on GitHub. It's easy to setup, just one config file to edit!

projects.name: myCTCA Patient Portal Redesign
projects.description: Led in the re-design of the myCTCA Patient Portal and created an interactive prototype illustrating a new mobile-first design.

projects.name: myCTCA Connect
projects.description: Designed and developed the web client for myCTCA Connect, a real-time secure messaging platform that enables patients to communicate directly with their care team.

projects.name: myCTCA Identity
projects.description: Helped architect and build out myCTCA Identity, a centralized identity provider implementing OAuth and OpenID Connect. Designed and developed the identity management user interface.

projects.name: StrongMind SIS
projects.description: As part of the SIS team I helped design and develop several features including the Student Course Roadmap, the Course Catalog Management tool, and many others. Also worked directly with an external client, Learn4Life, to design and implement custom attendance and grading modules that fit their unique processes.

projects.name: StrongMind LMS
projects.description: Worked as a full-stack developer on the LMS team. Worked on several projects including the build out of a new group project feature allowing students to chat and share documents with other group members in real-time.

projects.name: My Weigh 2 Prevent Diabetes
projects.description: Led in the design of an application built around the CDC’s National Diabetes Prevention Program. Translated the CDC’s program requirements into wireframes illustrating all application functionality and worked closely with an external development team to bring the application from concept to completed product within 8 weeks.

projects.name: Engage
projects.description: Led in the re-design and front end development of Engage, a custom CRM application. Conducted user interviews, performed competitive analysis, developed several functional prototypes, documented the design specication, and developed the application interface.

projects.name: Module Delivery System (MDS)
projects.description: Worked closely with Instructional Designers, Multimedia Developers, and other project stakeholders to design the new course authoring system and course viewer. As the sole developer on this project, I developed the application from front to back and successfully migrated all content from the old system to the new one.

projects.name: Pearson Digital Learning Intranet
projects.description: Re-designed the company intranet website from the ground up incorporating many new features including a custom search engine, a searchable employee roster, and a technical support knowledge base.

contact.description: Want to get in touch? Shoot me an e-mail at jaggedaz@gmail.com.
